Description: Tiraz fragment woven in undyed, yellow and red silk, attached to a piece of undyed silk plain weave; decorated with two bands of pseudo-Kufic inscription, and vegetal interlacing and medallions bearing stylised anmal motifs. Silk tiraz: Warp: silk, undyed, I or S, 18/cm Weft: silk, undyed, yellow and red, I or S, 40/cm Silk plain weave: Warp: silk, undyed, Z2s, 18/cm Weft: silk, undyed, Z2s, 18/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
